allow:
Bash(# Search for context.md file
CONTEXT_FILE=""""

echo ""Searching for context.md file...""

# Check root directory
if [ -f ""./context.md"" ]; then
    CONTEXT_FILE=""./context.md""
    echo ""Found context.md in root directory""
# Check docs directory  
elif [ -f ""./docs/context.md"" ]; then
    CONTEXT_FILE=""./docs/context.md""
    echo ""Found context.md in docs directory""
# Search recursively
else
    FOUND=$(find . -name ""context.md"" -type f | head -1)
    if [ -n ""$FOUND"" ]; then
        CONTEXT_FILE=""$FOUND""
        echo ""Found context.md at: $FOUND""
    else
        echo ""ERROR: No context.md file found in project""
        echo ""Use /write-context command to create one first""
        exit 1
    fi
fi

echo """"
echo ""=== RESTORING PREVIOUS CONTEXT ===""
echo ""Reading from: $CONTEXT_FILE""
echo """"

# Display the context file contents
cat ""$CONTEXT_FILE""

echo """"
echo ""=== CONTEXT RESTORATION COMPLETE ===""
echo """"
echo ""You can now continue where you left off based on the context above.""
echo ""Review the ''Next Steps Available'' section for recommended actions."")
